title: Retrieve your Top Seller status summary
description: Retrieve information for the authenticated user on if they have, or are eligible for Top Seller status.
permission_required: MyTradeMeRead: Read your membership & listing data.

returns.description: <TopSellerSummary> Statistics for the current week and the previous six weeks.

fields.name: SalesCount
fields.description: The number of sales over the last six weeks.

fields.name: SalesValue
fields.description: The total value of sales in dollars over the last six weeks.

fields.name: SellThroughRate
fields.description: The sell-through rate in percentage over the last six weeks.

fields.name: FeedbackRating
fields.description: The feedback rating over the last six weeks.

fields.name: InTrade
fields.description: Whether this member is in trade or not

fields.name: IsTopSeller
fields.description: Whether or not the member is a Top Seller.

fields.name: TopSellerStartDate
fields.description: The start date of the current period in which the member is a top seller (in UTC). Only applicable to members that are top sellers.

fields.name: QualifyingSalesCount
fields.description: The number of sales threshold the seller has to reach to eligible for Top Seller status

fields.name: QualifyingSalesValue
fields.description: The value of sales threshold the seller has to reach to eligible for Top Seller status

fields.name: QualifyingSellThroughRate
fields.description: The sell-through rate threshold the seller has to reach to eligible for Top Seller status

fields.name: QualifyingFeedbackRating
fields.description: The positive feedback ratio threshold the seller has to reach to eligible for Top Seller status

fields.name: TopSellerExpiryDate
fields.description: The end date of the current period in which the member is a top seller (in UTC). Only applicable to members that are top sellers.

fields.name: TopSellerFeeDiscount
fields.description: The percentage of discount (e.g. 0.15 for 15%) applicable to all fees except withdrawal fees, gallery plus, subtitle, reserve, 10-day auction, scheduled end time and second category. Only applicable to members that are top sellers.

fields.name: TopSellerSavings
fields.description: The Top Seller savings for this member.

nested_fields.description: The start date of the period (in UTC).
The end date of the period (in UTC).
How many weeks before the current week this saving is. 0 = current week.
